definition: medium-sized live-bearing shark with eyes at either end of a flattened hammer-shaped head
details:
noun
- medium-sized live-bearing shark with eyes at either end of a flattened hammer-shaped head
= synonyms: hammerhead shark
- the striking part of a hammer
- a stupid person
= synonyms: loggerhead, dunce, dunderhead, numskull, blockhead, bonehead, lunkhead, knucklehead, muttonhead, shithead, dumbass, fuckhead
